Selects an element of this collection.
send(ModelClass, Signal) - Static method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.Action
Asynchronously sends the specified signal to the specified target object.

Changes this variable to contain a ModelBool that represents the specified boolean value.

Changes this variable to contain a ModelInt that represents the specified integer value.

set(MT) - Method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.VariableType
Changes this variable to contain the specified value.
set(T) - Method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.VariableType
Abstract method that changes this variable to contain an MT instance (MT extends ModelType<T>) that represents the specified primitive value.
setDynamicChecks(boolean) - Static method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.ModelExecutor.Settings
Sets whether optional dynamic checks should be performed during model execution.
setExecutionTimeMultiplier(float) - Static method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.ModelExecutor.Settings
The model execution time helps testing txtUML models in the following way: when any time-related event inside the model is set to take ms milliseconds, that event will take ms * mul millseconds during model execution, where mul is the current execution time multiplier.
setExecutorErrorStream(PrintStream) - Static method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.ModelExecutor.Settings
Sets the stream on which the executor's error log is printed.
setExecutorLog(boolean) - Static method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.ModelExecutor.Settings
Sets whether executor's non-error log has to be shown.
setExecutorOutStream(PrintStream) - Static method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.ModelExecutor.Settings
Sets the stream on which the executor's non-error log is printed.
setUserErrorStream(PrintStream) - Static method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.ModelExecutor.Settings
Sets the stream on which the user's error log is printed.
setUserOutStream(PrintStream) - Static method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.ModelExecutor.Settings
Sets the stream on which the user's non-error log is printed.
shutdown() - Static method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.ModelExecutor
Sets the model executor to be shut down after the currently running and all scheduled actions have been performed and every non-external event caused by them have been processed.
shutdown() - Static method in class hu.elte.txtuml.stdlib.Timer
Initiates a shutdown process of the model executor which calls ModelExecutor.shutdown() the moment when no actions are currently scheduled.
shutdownNow() - Static method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.ModelExecutor
Shuts down the model executor without waiting for any currently running or scheduled actions to perform.
Signal - Class in hu.elte.txtuml.api
Base class for signals in the model.
signum() - Method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.ModelInt
Calculates signum(t) where t is the integer value of this object.
spliterator() - Method in interface hu.elte.txtuml.api.Collection
As iterators over collections are purely for API implementation issues, this method must not be used in the model.
start(ModelClass) - Static method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.Action
Starts the state machine of the specified model object.
start(ModelClass, Signal, ModelInt) - Static method in class hu.elte.txtuml.stdlib.Timer
Starts a new delayed send operation.
StateMachine - Class in hu.elte.txtuml.api
Base class for state machines in the model.

Base class for choice pseudostates in the model.

subtract(ModelInt) - Method in class hu.elte.txtuml.api.ModelInt
Calculates t - v where t is the integer value of this object and v is the integer value of the val parameter.
